text: Tuition Tuition Room and board Room and board Books and school supplies Books and school supplies Fees Fees Equipment and room materials Equipment and room materials The cost of taking a course varies from school to school. To search for tuition costs at different colleges, go to www.studentaid.ed.gov/myfsa. The cost of taking a course varies from school to school. To search for tuition costs at different colleges, go to www.studentaid.ed.gov/myfsa. The cost of lodging and food varies from school to school. Go to www.studentaid.ed.gov/myfsa to search for estimated costs. The cost of lodging and food varies from school to school. Go to www.studentaid.ed.gov/myfsa to search for estimated costs. Books can be expensive. School supplies can include book bags, notebooks, pens, pencils, paper, folders, stapler, desk organizing system (trays, pen holder, etc.), computer paper, etc. According to the College Board, the national average cost for textbooks at four-year public colleges in 2009-10 was $1,122. Books can be expensive. School supplies can include book bags, notebooks, pens, pencils, paper, folders, stapler, desk organizing system (trays, pen holder, etc.), computer paper, etc. According to the College Board, the national average cost for textbooks at four-year public colleges in 2009-10 was $1,122. Fees will depend on the school you're attending. This list can be obtained directly from the school. Fees include activity fees, parking decal fees, etc. Fees will depend on the school you're attending. This list can be obtained directly from the school. Fees include activity fees, parking decal fees, etc. Equipment may include a computer, printer, etc. Fumishings or room materials may include such items as reading lamps, microwave, refrigerator, sheets, towels, etc. Equipment may include a computer, printer, etc. Fumishings or room materials may include such items as reading lamps, microwave, refrigerator, sheets, towels, etc.
